name: Web Page GIF Scroll Animation
special_instructions: The 'Scroll down' option, when selected, will make the tool scroll down the page and capture it to create the gif.
The 'Slow down animations' option, when selected, slows down animations on the page so they can be properly captured.
The 'Lossy compression' and 'Lossless compression' options are used to compress the GIF using Giflossy and Gifsicle respectively.
The 'Viewport width' and 'Viewport height' options are used to set the inner width and height of the browser window.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
